claimFunctionalOwnership().details: Allows the pendingFunctionalOwner address to finalize the transfer.

claimMigrationOwnership().details: Allows the pendingMigrationOwner address to finalize the transfer.

functionalOwner().details: Returns the address of the current functionalOwner.

guardianCertificationChanged(address,boo.details: Called by: guardian registration contract Notifies on a guardian certification change

guardianRegistered(address).details: Called by: guardian registration contract Notifies a new guardian was registered

guardianUnregistered(address).details: Called by: guardian registration contract Notifies a new guardian was unregistered

isFunctionalOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current functionalOwner.

isMigrationOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current migrationOwner.

migrationOwner().details: Returns the address of the current migrationOwner.

renounceFunctionalOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without functionalOwner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current functionalOwner.     * NOTE: Renouncing functionalOwnership will leave the contract without an functionalOwner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the functionalOwner.

renounceMigrationOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without migrationOwner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current migrationOwner.     * NOTE: Renouncing migrationOwnership will leave the contract without an migrationOwner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the migrationOwner.

transferFunctionalOwnership(address).details: Allows the current functionalOwner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newFunctionalOwner: The address to transfer functionalOwnership to.

transferMigrationOwnership(address).details: Allows the current migrationOwner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newMigrationOwner: The address to transfer migrationOwnership to.
